attributes.action: Call for vote of no confidence in this government
attributes.additional_details:
We want your right to voice your opinion on the current government and it's policies.

People are being forced into poverty and so is the country as whole under this government, are you a victim of this government ? Are you a victim of redundancy or the bedroom tax? Or the closure of sure start centres, libraries, town halls, leisure centres? The list could go on , they are taking us into a triple dip recession for the first time in the history of the world.

Do we want this to continue or do we want it to end by people power ! YOU should be heard , have your say by signing this petition !

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
